alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 9:15PM CDT until April 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DONIPHAN...NORTHWESTERN LEAVENWORTH...EASTERN ATCHISON...BUCHANAN...NORTHWESTERN PLATTE AND SOUTHEASTERN ANDREW COUNTIES... At 914 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Country Club Villa to near Oskaloosa, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Atchison, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Country Club Villa, Country Club, Agency, Union Star, Amazonia, Rushville, Easton, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, De Kalb, Cosby, Iatan, Faucett, Helena and Lowemont. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 35 and 59. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
